column4: Hey guys. Is there a reason why the Ubuntu liveCD installer doesn't want to mount anything other than ext3?
, are you trying to repair a volume?

No, i'm installing on an already partitioned disk. I wanted to use reiserfs for /boot and / but if i choose anything other than ext3 for the 2  the installer complains that it can't mount them and returns me to the partition setup.
, i'm not sure you can -- are you in a graphical installation?
